3: Yo! Commandant, what are you doing here sneaking around?
Wow... I thought you were spying on something top secret but what's so interesting about Lee? Just go in and say hi... Hi! Lee!!
You were busy with something and I saw Commandant here peeking for a while now.
Commandant, care to explain why you were loitering outside my room?

2: I didn't want to disturb you.

3: ...Just let me know next time, I wouldn't bar you from entering.
See, I told you to just go and say hi!
But I'm curious about what you were doing too.
Don't you two have a mission to do or something other than spying on me?

2: Checking up on your wellbeing is also my job.

3: ...Look all you want, I'm quite sure you'll lose interest soon enough.
What about me? I'm interested even if Commandant isn't!
